   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(cprof_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: -export([basic_test/0, on_load_test/1, modules_test/1]).
   36: 
   37: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   38: %% Test server related stuff
   39: %%
   40: 
   41: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   42: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   43: -export([config/2]).
   44: -else.
   45: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   46: -endif.
   47: 
   48: -ifdef(debug).
   49: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   50: -define(line, erlang:display({?MODULE,?LINE}), ).
   51: -endif.
   52: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   53: -else.
   54: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   55: -define(line, noop, ).
   56: -endif.
   57: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   58: -endif.
   59: 
   60: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   61: config(priv_dir, _) ->
   62:     ".";
   63: config(data_dir, _) ->
   64:     "cprof_SUITE_data".
   65: -else.
   66: %% When run in test server.
   67: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   68: -export([basic/1, on_load/1, modules/1]).
   69: 
   70: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   74:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [local,meta,call_count]),
   75:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_count]),
   76:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
   77:     ok.
   78: 
   79: suite() ->
   80:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   81:      {timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   82: 
   83: all() ->
   84:     [basic, on_load, modules].
   85: 
   86: %% Tests basic profiling
   87: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     basic_test().
   89: 
   90: %% Tests profiling of unloaded module
   91: on_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   92:     on_load_test(Config).
   93: 
   94: %% Tests profiling of several modules
   95: modules(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     modules_test(Config).
   97: 
   98: -endif. %-ifdef(STANDALONE). ... -else.
   99: 
  100: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  101: %%% The Tests
  102: %%%
  103: 
  104: basic_test() ->
  105:     M = 1000,
  106:     %%
  107:     M2 = M*2,
  108:     M3 = M*3,
  109:     M2__1 = M2 + 1,
  110:     M3__1 = M3 + 1,
  111:     N = cprof:stop(),
  112:     %%
  113:     2 = cprof:start(?MODULE, seq_r),
  114:     1 = cprof:start(?MODULE, seq, 3),
  115:     L = seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  116:     Lr = seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  117:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  118:     %%
  119:     io:format("~p~n~p~n~p~n",
  120:               [erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,sec_r,3}, all),
  121:                erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,sec_r,4}, all),
  122:                erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,sec,3}, all)]),
  123:     %%
  124:     ModAna1 = {?MODULE,M2__1,[{{?MODULE,seq_r,4},M},
  125:                               {{?MODULE,seq,3},M},
  126:                               {{?MODULE,seq_r,3},1}]},
  127:     ModAna1 = cprof:analyse(?MODULE,0),
  128:     {M2__1, [ModAna1]} = cprof:analyse(),
  129:     ModAna1 = cprof:analyse(?MODULE, 1),
  130:     {M2__1, [ModAna1]} = cprof:analyse(1),
  131:     %%
  132:     ModAna2 = {?MODULE,M2__1,[{{?MODULE,seq_r,4},M},
  133:                               {{?MODULE,seq,3},M}]},
  134:     ModAna2 = cprof:analyse(?MODULE, 2),
  135:     {M2__1, [ModAna2]} = cprof:analyse(2),
  136:     %%
  137:     2 = cprof:pause(?MODULE, seq_r),
  138:     L = seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  139:     Lr = seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  140:     %%
  141:     ModAna3 = {?MODULE,M3__1,[{{?MODULE,seq,3},M2},
  142:                               {{?MODULE,seq_r,4},M},
  143:                               {{?MODULE,seq_r,3},1}]},
  144:     ModAna3 = cprof:analyse(?MODULE),
  145:     %%
  146:     N = cprof:pause(),
  147:     L = seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  148:     Lr = seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  149:     %%
  150:     {M3__1, [ModAna3]} = cprof:analyse(),
  151:     %%
  152:     N = cprof:restart(),
  153:     L = seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  154:     Lr = seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  155:     %%
  156:     ModAna1 = cprof:analyse(?MODULE),
  157:     %%
  158:     N = cprof:stop(),
  159:     {?MODULE,0,[]} = cprof:analyse(?MODULE),
  160:     {0,[]} = cprof:analyse(),
  161:     ok.
  162: 
  163: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  164: 
  165: on_load_test(Config) ->
  166:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  167:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  168:     File = filename:join(Data, "cprof_SUITE_test"),
  169:     Module = cprof_SUITE_test,
  170:     M = 1000,
  171:     %%
  172:     M2 = M*2,
  173:     M2__1 = M2 + 1,
  174:     N1 = cprof:start(),
  175: 
  176:     {ok,Module} = c:c(File, [{outdir,Priv}]),
  177: 
  178:     %% If this system is hipe-enabled, the loader may have called module_info/1
  179:     %% when Module was loaded above. Reset the call count to avoid seeing
  180:     %% the call in the analysis below.
  181: 
  182:     1 = cprof:restart(Module, module_info, 1),
  183: 
  184:     L = Module:seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  185:     Lr = Module:seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  186:     Lr = lists:reverse(L),
  187:     N2 = cprof:pause(),
  188:     N3 = cprof:pause(Module),
  189:     {Module,M2__1,[{{Module,seq_r,4},M},
  190:                    {{Module,seq,3},M},
  191:                    {{Module,seq_r,3},1}]} = cprof:analyse(Module),
  192:     io:format("~p ~p ~p~n", [N1, N2, N3]),
  193:     code:purge(Module),
  194:     code:delete(Module),
  195:     N4 = N2 - N3,
  196:     %%
  197:     N4 = cprof:restart(),
  198:     {ok,Module} = c:c(File, [{outdir,Priv}]),
  199:     L = Module:seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  200:     Lr = Module:seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  201:     L = seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  202:     Lr = seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  203:     N2 = cprof:pause(),
  204:     {Module,0,[]} = cprof:analyse(Module),
  205:     M4__4 = M*4 - 4,
  206:     M6_3 = M*6 - 3,
  207:     {?MODULE,M6_3,[{{?MODULE,succ,1},M4__4},
  208:                     {{?MODULE,seq_r,4},M},
  209:                     {{?MODULE,seq,3},M},
  210:                     {{?MODULE,seq_r,3},1}]}
  211:     = cprof:analyse(?MODULE),
  212:     N2 = cprof:stop(),
  213:     ok.
  214: 
  215: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  216: 
  217: modules_test(Config) ->
  218:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  219:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  220:     File = filename:join(Data, "cprof_SUITE_test"),
  221:     Module = cprof_SUITE_test,
  222:     {ok,Module} = c:c(File, [{outdir,Priv}]),
  223:     M = 10,
  224:     %%
  225:     M2 = M*2,
  226:     M2__1 = M2 + 1,
  227:     erlang:yield(),
  228:     N = cprof:start(),
  229:     L = Module:seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  230:     Lr = Module:seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  231:     L = seq(1, M, fun succ/1),
  232:     Lr = seq_r(1, M, fun succ/1),
  233:     N = cprof:pause(),
  234:     Lr = lists:reverse(L),
  235:     M4_4 = M*4 - 4,
  236:     M6_3 = M*6 - 3,
  237:     M2__1 = M*2 + 1,
  238:     {Tot,ModList} = cprof:analyse(),
  239:     {value,{?MODULE,M6_3,[{{?MODULE,succ,1},M4_4},
  240:                            {{?MODULE,seq_r,4},M},
  241:                            {{?MODULE,seq,3},M},
  242:                            {{?MODULE,seq_r,3},1}]}} =
  243:       lists:keysearch(?MODULE, 1, ModList),
  244:     {value,{Module,M2__1,[{{Module,seq_r,4},M},
  245:                           {{Module,seq,3},M},
  246:                           {{Module,seq_r,3},1}]}} =
  247:       lists:keysearch(Module, 1, ModList),
  248:     Tot = lists:foldl(fun ({_,C,_}, A) -> C+A end, 0, ModList),
  249:     {cprof,_,Prof} = cprof:analyse(cprof),
  250:     {value,{{cprof,pause,0},1}} = lists:keysearch({cprof,pause,0}, 1, Prof),
  251:     N = cprof:stop(),
  252:     ok.
  253: 
  254: 
  255: 
  256: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  257: %% Local helpers
  258: 
  259: 
  260: %% Stack recursive seq
  261: seq(Stop, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  262:     [Stop];
  263: seq(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  264:     [Start | seq(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ)].
  265: 
  266: 
  267: 
  268: %% Tail recursive seq, result list is reversed
  269: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  270:     seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, []).
  271: 
  272: seq_r(Stop, Stop, _, R) ->
  273:     [Stop | R];
  274: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, R) ->
  275:     seq_r(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ, [Start | R]).
  276: 
  277: 
  278: %% Successor
  279: succ(X) -> X+1.
